trans-unit.source: Represents the transactional environment of the workflow instance that is running on the current thread.
trans-unit.target: Representa o ambiente de transações da instância do fluxo de trabalho que está em execução no thread atual.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowEnvironment> represents the transactional environment of the workflow instance that is running on the current thread.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowEnvironment> representa o ambiente de transações da instância do fluxo de trabalho que está em execução no thread atual.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowEnvironment> has two properties: the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowEnvironment.WorkBatch%2A> property, which exposes the current work batch and allows a host or a host service to participate in the current transaction by adding <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.IPendingWork> items to this property; and the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowEnvironment.WorkflowInstanceId%2A> property, which exposes the <xref:System.Guid> of the workflow instance currently running on this thread.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowEnvironment> tem duas propriedades: o <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowEnvironment.WorkBatch%2A> propriedade, que expõe o lote de trabalho atual e permite que um host ou um serviço de host para participar da transação atual, adicionando <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.IPendingWork> itens para essa propriedade; e o <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowEnvironment.WorkflowInstanceId%2A> propriedade, que expõe o <xref:System.Guid> da instância do fluxo de trabalho em execução no momento neste thread.
Obtém o lote de trabalho atual.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.IWorkBatch" /> that represents the current work batch.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.IWorkBatch" /> que representa o lote de trabalho atual.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowEnvironment.WorkBatch%2A> property allows hosts or host services to participate in the current transaction by adding pending work items to the current work batch.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowEnvironment.WorkBatch%2A> propriedade permite hosts ou hospedar serviços para participar da transação atual, adicionando itens de trabalho pendentes para o lote de trabalho atual.

trans-unit.source: A host or a host service that wants to participate in the current transaction must implement the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.IPendingWork> interface and use <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.IWorkBatch.Add%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> to add pending work items to <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowEnvironment.WorkBatch%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Um host ou um serviço de host que deseja participar na transação atual deve implementar o <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.IPendingWork> interface e usar <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.IWorkBatch.Add%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> para adicionar itens de trabalho pendente <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowEnvironment.WorkBatch%2A>.

trans-unit.source: Durable services should add items to <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowEnvironment.WorkBatch%2A> to keep the state of their data stores consistent with the state of the workflow instance.
trans-unit.target: Serviços duráveis devem adicionar itens à <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowEnvironment.WorkBatch%2A> para manter o estado de seus repositórios de dados consistentes com o estado da instância do fluxo de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: The out-of-box durable services, <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingService> and <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.SqlWorkflowPersistenceService>, both implement this functionality.
trans-unit.target: Os serviços duráveis out-of-box, <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingService> e <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.SqlWorkflowPersistenceService>, ambos implementam essa funcionalidade.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Guid" /> of the workflow instance associated with the current thread.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o <see cref="T:System.Guid" /> da instância do fluxo de trabalho associada ao thread atual.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Guid" /> that identifies the current workflow instance.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Guid" /> que identifica a instância de fluxo de trabalho atual.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowEnvironment.WorkflowInstanceId%2A> contains the <xref:System.Guid> of the workflow instance currently running in this thread.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowEnvironment.WorkflowInstanceId%2A> contém o <xref:System.Guid> da instância do fluxo de trabalho em execução no momento neste thread.

trans-unit.source: Whenever code is run from within a workflow thread, you can get the <xref:System.Guid> of the workflow instance through the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowEnvironment.WorkflowInstanceId%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Sempre que o código for executado de dentro de um thread de fluxo de trabalho, você pode obter o <xref:System.Guid> da instância do fluxo de trabalho por meio de <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowEnvironment.WorkflowInstanceId%2A> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: For example, if your code is in a service called by an activity, <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowEnvironment.WorkflowInstanceId%2A> will provide <xref:System.Guid> of the workflow instance for the calling activity.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, se seu código está em um serviço chamado por uma atividade, <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowEnvironment.WorkflowInstanceId%2A> fornecerá <xref:System.Guid> da instância do fluxo de trabalho para a atividade de chamada.
